name: Zeleros Global S.L.
headAddress: Muelle de la Aduana Edificio Lanzadera
goal:
-To develop a faster and more energy-efficient ground transport system to move at 1000 km/h with reduced infrastructure cost: the hyperloop.
-To create an international framework initiated by Europe to support the development of the hyperloop transport system, connecting private companies with public stakeholders to integrate implementation efforts, to define regulations and standards, and to assess development requirements.
interests: Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, International co-operation and development, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: - Not yet, but mainly interested in DG Move, DG R&D and DG Climate Action initiatives.
